attributes.action: Scrap the 2012 Olympic logo and ensure Wolff Olins pay back the absurd amount of £400,000 for designing such a disgusting logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: How can a company justify charging an extortionate amount of money for someone to doodle for a few minutes and produce such a poor design for the 2012 Olympic logo. We should be asking Wolff Olins to payback the £400,000 pounds they have "stolen" for a so called years work and give it to a company who can produce something more appropriate at a more realistic price.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
